```{r}
require(ncovr)
# Sys.setlocale('LC_CTYPE', 'Chinese')
ncov <- get_ncov()
ncov <- ncov$overall
knitr::include_graphics(unlist(ncov$dailyPics))
```

```{r, results='asis'}
cat(

  '确诊：', ncov$confirmedCount,  "  \n\n",
  '疑似：', ncov$suspectedCount,  "  \n\n",
  '治愈：', ncov$curedCount,  "  \n\n",
  '死亡：', ncov$deadCount,  "  \n\n",
  '严重：', ncov$seriousCount,  "  \n\n",
  '今日新增确诊：', ncov$confirmedIncr,  "  \n\n",
  '今日新增疑似：', ncov$suspectedIncr,  "  \n\n",
  '今日新增治愈：', ncov$curedIncr,  "  \n\n",
  '今日新增死亡：', ncov$deadIncr,  "  \n\n",
```
